languages.text: {n}Несколько минут Арлекин остается недвижим, словно пестрая статуя. Наконец из-под маски доносится мелодичный голос:{/n} "Я готов попробовать, мон-кай".

traits.locale_text: {n}Несколько минут Арлекин остается недвижим, словно пестрая статуя. Наконец из-под маски доносится мелодичный голос:{/n} "Я готов попробовать, мон-кай".
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: {n}The Harlequin remains as still as a garish statue for several minutes. Then the mellifluous voice behind the mask says,{/n} "I am willing to try, mon-keigh."
languages.original_text: {n}Несколько минут Арлекин остается недвижим, словно пестрая статуя. Наконец из-под маски доносится мелодичный голос:{/n} "Я готов попробовать, мон-кай".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Harlequin remains still as a colourful statue for several minutes. Then the melodious voice behind the mask says,{/n} "I am willing to try, mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

traits.locale_text: {n}The Harlequin remains still as a colourful statue for several minutes. Then the melodious voice behind the mask says,{/n} "I am willing to try, mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

traits.locale_text: {n}The Harlequin remains still as a garish statue for several minutes. Then the mellifluous voice behind the mask says,{/n} "I am willing to try, mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

traits.locale_text: {n}The Harlequin remains still as a garish statue for several minutes. Then the mellifluous voice behind the mask says,{/n} "I am willing to try, mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

traits.locale_text: {n}The Harlequin remains as still as a garish statue for several minutes. Then the mellifluous voice behind the mask says,{/n} "I am willing to try, mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

traits.locale_text: {n}The Harlequin remains as still as a garish statue for several minutes. Then the mellifluous voice behind the mask says,{/n} "I am willing to try, mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: {n}ハーレクィンはけばけばしい彫像のように突っ立っている。しばらくして、仮面の下から甘い声が放たれる。{/n}「ぜひやらせてくれ、モン＝ケイ」
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin remains as still as a garish statue for several minutes. Then the mellifluous voice behind the mask says,{/n} "I am willing to try, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハーレクィンはけばけばしい彫像のように突っ立っている。しばらくして、仮面の下から甘い声が放たれる。{/n}「ぜひやらせてくれ、モン＝ケイ」
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: {n}丑角静静地站了几分钟，像一尊华丽的雕像一样。随后，面具后面响起了婉转动听的声音。{/n}“我愿意试试，猴子。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin remains as still as a garish statue for several minutes. Then the mellifluous voice behind the mask says,{/n} "I am willing to try, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}丑角静静地站了几分钟，像一尊华丽的雕像一样。随后，面具后面响起了婉转动听的声音。{/n}“我愿意试试，猴子。”
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: {n}L'Arlequin reste figé comme une statue pendant quelques minutes. Enfin, la voix mélodieuse émerge de derrière le masque :{/n} « Je veux bien essayer, mon-keigh. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin remains as still as a garish statue for several minutes. Then the mellifluous voice behind the mask says,{/n} "I am willing to try, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'arlequin reste figé comme une statue pendant quelques minutes. Enfin, la voix mélodieuse émerge de derrière le masque :{/n} « Je veux bien essayer, mon-keigh. »
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: {n}El Arlequín permanece inmóvil como una estatua estridente durante unos minutos. Después, la voz meliflua tras la máscara dice:{/n} «Estoy dispuesto a intentarlo, mon-keigh».
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin remains as still as a garish statue for several minutes. Then the mellifluous voice behind the mask says,{/n} "I am willing to try, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Arlequín permanece inmóvil como una estatua estridente durante unos minutos. Después, la voz meliflua tras la máscara dice:{/n} «Estoy dispuesto a intentarlo, mon-keigh».
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: {n}Der Harlekin steht mehrere Minuten lang still wie eine geschmacklose Statue. Dann sagt die liebliche Stimme hinter der Maske:{/n} "Ich bin bereit, es zu versuchen, Chem-Pan-Sey."
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin remains as still as a garish statue for several minutes. Then the mellifluous voice behind the mask says,{/n} "I am willing to try, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Harlekin steht mehrere Minuten lang still wie eine geschmacklose Statue. Dann sagt die liebliche Stimme hinter der Maske:{/n} "Ich bin bereit, es zu versuchen, Chem-Pan-Sey."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: {n}Arleken, birkaç dakika boyunca havalı bir heykel misali hareketsiz bekliyor. Ardından da maskenin ardından bal tatlılığında bir ses duyuluyor.{/n} "Denemeye razıyım mon-keigh."
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin remains as still as a garish statue for several minutes. Then the mellifluous voice behind the mask says,{/n} "I am willing to try, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Arleken, birkaç dakikalığına cırtlak bir heykel kadar hareketsiz kalıyor. Ardından da maskenin ardından bal kadar tatlı bir ses duyuluyor.{/n} "Denemeye razıyım mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader
